DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of blood pressure variability in the acute phase of intraparenchimal cerebral haemorrhage and its consequences to clinical outcome
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Monitoring of Blood Pressure in Spontaneous Intraparenchimal Cerebral Haemorrhage
DOC.criteria: hospitalization only for spontaneous intraparenchimal cerebral haemorrhage age over 18 years cerebral haemorrhage secondary to other causes
